Author: algorthin
Text: I've only been in the treatment facility that I'm in now but it sounds like you're in one of the locations of mine lol. At my challenge snack they've been like "two cookies" and I'm just like... On the one hand, I was not able to finish those cookies, but on the other hand, this isn't that much of a challenge.   Also when I was in resi they were like "Exposure! You have to eat three french fries if you don't need an extra starch!"   Like uhh okay, what's even the point of that.
